#include <bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;

void Print (const vector<string>& v){
    //vector<int> v;
    for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++){
        cout << (i + 1) << ' ' << v[i] << endl;
    }
}

 
int main()
{
    int n, i;
    string x;
 
    cin >> n;
    
    map <string, int> m;
    vector <string> name;
    int prev = 0;
    
    for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
        cin >> x;
        ++m[x];
        if(m[x] > prev) {
        	name.push_back(x);
        	prev++;
        }
    }
    
    Print(name);
    
    return 0;
}
